column1: Baby Barnaby's////I sort of dislike the tag "gay friendly" that you see in restaurant listings. It just sounds like "Warning: An inordinate number of gay people go here
column2: and suggests places without the tag are discriminatory. But this Montrose breakfast staple certainly is gay friendly, and boasts several Best Breakfast" awards from Out Smart magazine. I don't care whether the clientele is white
column8: Baby Barnaby's makes a damn fine start to your day.
